title: Emma
description: The story of a sixteen year oldâ€™s unexpected journey of self-discovery..SummaryEmma is a sixteen year old high school student living with her brother and mother. Having shunned herself into the background from an early age and written herself off as plain and unalluring, a crush on a boy sends her into an unexpected journey of self-discovery that re-defines the person she always thought she was.
author: Carol A. Robi
